name: social-media-downloader
description: Download videos and photos from social media platforms

scripts.start:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOST=localhost PORT=3001 node server.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOST=localhost PORT=3001 nodemon server.js
scripts.dev:network: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3001 nodemon server.js
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-client && npm run build-client
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Vercel build: installing client and building...' && npm run install-client && npm run build-client

author: ItHakiraxx
